title: 神奇宝贝服务器刷怪问题
author: 十雨
txt_content:
服务器神奇宝贝刷怪刷的好快好多

就是我想让神奇宝贝不刷怪这么多，怎么限制（不是指神兽）

是指普通的神奇宝贝精灵怎么限制


第二个问题就是怎么让一个世界生成神奇宝贝 让另一个世界生成神奇宝贝

replies.author: z905285909
replies.txt_content:
在服务端找到Config文件夹，在里面找到pixelmon.cfg这个文件
然后拉到下面
    # Sets the max number of flying Pokemon in the world at a time (higher numbers = more spawns). (KEEP THIS LOW.)    I:"Max number of Air Pokemon (at one time)"=2

    # Sets the max number of land Pokemon in the world at a time (higher numbers = more spawns).
    I:"Max number of Land Pokemon (at one time)"=40

    # Sets the max number of underground Pokemon in the world at a time (higher numbers = more spawns).
    I:"Max number of Underground Pokemon (at one time)"=20

    # Sets the max number of water Pokemon in the world at a time (higher numbers = more spawns).
    I:"Max number of Water Pokemon (at one time)"=20

后面的数字越大刷新的越多，
从上到下 第一个是天空，第二个是陆地，第三个是地底下，第四个是水里，如果是要少刷新那就改成比较少的数字
或者装一个mod，是神奇宝贝的附属Mod  SpawnOfPsyduc  ,如果需要可以回复找我.
